name: Sphere (itch) (IttzMemphis)
description:
Thankyou For Playing Sphere (demo).

Sphere - is a single player, third-person, puzzle game. The aim of the game....solve the puzzles in each level to advance to the next. 

You are the sphere.

Play as a sphere, navigate the areas of each level solving the puzzles and complete the game. 

At this stage, there is a total of 6 playable levels.

Controls: 

W  - Forward

A - Left

S - Backwards

D - Right

SPACE BAR - Jump
